gist.headline: Silencing the CI noise
gist.blurb: Optimized our security scanning workflows to focus strictly on the main branch, keeping the pipeline clean and efficient.
gist.summary: Replaced the default CodeQL configuration with a custom workflow that excludes the news branch to prevent unnecessary runs.
gist.impact: Developers will see fewer failed checks on automated news updates, resulting in a cleaner and faster CI experience.
gist.visual_concept: The bee mascot acting as a security guard or organizer, filtering specific branches. A sorting mechanism separating 'main' code from 'news' updates.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot wearing a tiny security cap, sorting pixelated data scrolls into a glowing green bin labeled 'MAIN'. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'CLEAN CI'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
